comments.html:
Hello again.
And this one too :)
I want to ask you to grant for me the permission to translate your article "Router Configuration Management … Too Good to be True?" into russian and publish it in cisco_ru (http://community.livejournal.com/cisco_ru/profile) - russian Cisco LiveJournal community, in my blog (http://romik-g.livejournal.com/) and on http://www.opennet.ru/ site, which is one of the largest russian system and network administration info server.
comments.name: Anonymous
